params.name: name
params.description: The name of the scheduler to use.

params.name: optimizer
params.description: The optimizer that will be used during training.

params.name: num_warmup_steps
params.description: The number of warmup steps to do. This is not required by all schedulers (hence the argument beingoptional), the function will raise an error if its unset and the scheduler type requires it.

params.name: num_training_steps
params.description: The number of training steps to do. This is not required by all schedulers (hence the argument beingoptional), the function will raise an error if its unset and the scheduler type requires it.

params.name: scheduler_specific_kwargs
params.description: Extra parameters for schedulers such as cosine with restarts. Mismatched scheduler types and schedulerparameters will cause the scheduler function to raise a TypeError.
